column2: Select which artifact to gift to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
Which artifact do you wish to gift to [artifact_recipient.GetTitledFirstName]?
Maybe one of my other ones
This one shall be of use to [artifact_recipient.GetHerHim]
I think this one would be best for [artifact_recipient.GetHerHim]
They are deserving of this artifact

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I have decided to give to you one of my artifacts in the hopes that you will find more use for it than I ever did, it should be delivered alongside this letter and I hope you enjoy this gift.

Your [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName]
